arStrings.szText: Flurry damage increased and Energy cost reduced.

Each time {c_important}Flurry{/c} hits an enemy, it has a {c_number}[{SF_36}*100|%|]{/c} chance to apply {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} seconds and deals {c_number}[1|%x|]{/c} increased damage for {c_number}{buffduration:EMPOWERED_FLURRY}{/c} seconds after hitting a {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} enemy, up to a total of {c_number}[SF_33}|%x|]{/c}.
Casting {c_important}Flurry{/c} dashes you to the target and Heals {c_number}[{SF_8}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life.
Successive casts of {c_important}Flurry{/c} increase its damage by {c_number}[SF_43 * 100|%|]{/c} and reduce its Energy cost by {c_number}[SF_42 * 100|%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}{SF_35}{/c} times.
